      • generateExpTable

        public void generateExpTable(int numThreads)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This should be called after all query elements have been added in order to generate the expTable. For int exponentiation with BigIntegers, assumes that dataPartitionBitSize < 32.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
